title: Maja
intro:
## Maja

Age during the event: _34_

During the event Maja was located in _Rakovica_, the county that was most heavily bombed in Belgrade. A few weeks before it started she became _(my) mother_.

hover.name: Plane001
hover.text: I never wore my pajama during this time. I thought, if a bomb hits our house, I wouldn’t want to be found dead in pajamas.

hover.name: Plane017
hover.text: I didn’t understand what happened at first. You were young. I left the room, I’ve just changed your clothes, and then at 8 was the first time it exploded. I forgot the exact date. Subconsciously but also consciously to a degree. That evening it exploded in our area, for the first time in Straževica. Straževica is that hill 500 kilometers (air path?) away from our apartment.
